Package com.ae2dms.model

Class GameGrid

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.model.GameGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable
public class GameGrid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable, java.lang.Cloneable
GameGrid class can be used to create a 2D grid and gameObjects to it.
Version:
2.0

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  GameGrid.GridIterator
    GridIterator provides the interface to iterate through the grid containing the GameObjects for the current Level.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    GameGrid​(int columns, int rows)
    Creates the grid using columns and rows to set the maximum size.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameGrid

      public GameGrid​(int columns, int rows)
      Creates the grid using columns and rows to set the maximum size.
      Parameters:
      columns - the number of columns
      rows - the number of rows

  • Method Details

    • getDimension

      public java.awt.Dimension getDimension()
      Returns the size of this grid as Dimension.
      Returns:
      a Dimension GameObject that indicates the size of this grid

    • getGameObjectAt

      public GameObject getGameObjectAt​(int col, int row) throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Gets the GameObject positioned at (x, y).
      Parameters:
      col - the row of the GameObject
      row - the column of the GameObject
      Returns:
      GameObject
      Throws:
      java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the coordinates are outside the grid bounds

    • getGameObjectAt

      public GameObject getGameObjectAt​(java.awt.Point p)
      Gets an GameObject located at the chosen Point
      Parameters:
      p - the point where the GameObject should be found
      Returns:
      GameObject if the the GameObject is found || null if the point is null

    • removeGameObjectAt

      public boolean removeGameObjectAt​(java.awt.Point position)
      Removes a GameObject from the grid
      Parameters:
      position - the position putting null in the GameObject position
      Returns:
      boolean true if it was possible to remove the GameObject, false otherwise

    • putGameObjectAt

      public boolean putGameObjectAt​(GameObject gameObject, int x, int y)
      Puts a GameObject into the specified location (x, y).
      Parameters:
      gameObject - the gameObject to be put into the array
      x - the x coordinate
      y - the y coordinate
      Returns:
      true if the operation is successful, false otherwise

    • putGameObjectAt

      public boolean putGameObjectAt​(GameObject gameObject, java.awt.Point p)
      Puts a GameObject into the specified point.
      Parameters:
      gameObject - the GameObject to be put into the array
      p - the point where the GameObject will be put into
      Returns:
      true if the operation is successful, false otherwise.
